entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet published containers adding ".git" to image source label #38176
  • Installing a tool that targets a framework not installed gives a non-actionable error message. #38172
  • Workload ID maui-android is not recognized #38171
  • GenAPI drops ref keyword when generating reference source for System.Memory/4.5.5 #38166

Closed

  • For workload feature bands, treat `-rtm` preview versions the same as the stabilized, non-preview versions #36500
    8.0.2xx
  • Reenable CanRunDsicoveryTool test after rc2 runtime codeflow from templating #36587
  • [Regression] APICompat / PackageValidation runs without a runtime graph #38013
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Preview 2 branding #38177
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplified the code according to #38123 comment #38163
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat rtm as stable Fixes #36500 #37160
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update CI #37984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Define RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath in outer-build #38168
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the hard code of System.Data.SqlClient package version #38123
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add filtering to SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion validation. Fixes #38016. #38017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
